title: Please make this true PLS!!!

embed.description: Just something on the side for fun. This is for the PolyCount Riot Art Contest for 2017! There were a lot of amazing submissions don't think I would win but thought it would be interesting to do

body:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/JKNwZ
- Concept art by Michelle Bos 

Dear Riot,

I know Zyra has 'recently' got a really good skin, but the concept from Michelle Bos is so good!! It's so attempting!!

I would buy it even if you price it 3250. 

Also, this skin is genius because the Program series does not yet have a rivalry like the 'dragon slayer' and 'dragon master/sorceress' in the dragon series. Zyra fits in perfectly with the idea of virus spreading which could be seen as the villain in the program universe. 

Since you have actually made pizza delivering sivir come alive, please also make this one. It would be great!!

Best
